text: Ah, Wilderness! is a 1935 American comedy drama movie directed by Clarence Brown and is based on the 1933 play of the same name by Eugene O'Neill. It stars Wallace Beery, Lionel Barrymore, Mickey Rooney, Cecilia Parker, Eric Linden, Aline MacMahon, Spring Byington and was distributed by Metro-Goldwyn- Mayer. ==Other websites== * * Category:1930s comedy movies Category:1930s American drama movies Category:American comedy-drama movies Category:Movies directed by Clarence Brown
title: Ah, Wilderness!
